pros: Supportive and welcoming environment. Excellent facilities for staff and students.
cons: High pressure for results. The job is more than a lecturer, but little admin time is give to work with students one-to-one.

job_title: Human Resources Assistant in Chesterfield, England
pros: Local, fun environment to work in
cons: Felt underpaid and underappreciated for my level of experience.

job_title: Work Based Learning Tutor in Rotherham, England
pros: You are respected and treated as a professional practitioner with fantastic development opportunities. The atmosphere is very positive and the surroundings are safe making it a nice place to work. Management are supportive and lead the team onwards and upwards.
cons: Parking is an issue for staff if not getting to work at least 1 hour before you are due to start work.
